name: gyroscopically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with the use of a gyroscope (= a device containing a wheel that spins freely within a frame, used on aircraft, ships, etc. to help keep them horizontal): The roller coaster was mounted with a gyroscopically stable camera that remained steady as the ride went around turns and loops. The security guard does patrols around the premises on a gyroscopically balanced motorised scooter. Related word
gyroscope
More examplesFewer examplesThe lunar rover has gyroscopically controlled wheels that allow it to remain balanced and upright as it moves over rocky terrain.
